description: Candy Corn is one cocktail you don't want to miss out on this&nbsp;Halloween. The sweet flavor of this drink will have your mouth watering for more!This beverage’s unique blend includes kettle corn gin,&nbsp;wine, and candy corns that are perfectly balanced between each other with just enough tanginess from the citrus peel grenadine syrup.
name: Candy Corn
